questions.question: Considering the overall form and structure, what is the primary function of this piece of furniture?
Based on the visual texture and apparent material, what is the upholstery fabric of the sofa?
Disregarding any pattern, what single word best describes the shade of the sofa?
Describe the predominant shape of the sofa's seat cushions, from a direct overhead view?
What adjective best describes the overall style and design of the sofa, considering its form?
Judging by the image, what is the apparent number of individual seating spaces offered?
What is the visible form of the armrests' support structure in relation to the sofa?
Observe the base; what single term best describes its visible design?
Describe the visible consistency of the fabric texture across the seating area?
Based on the height and depth of the cushions, what is the best single descriptor of the comfort level?
Disregarding color, describe the overall silhouette of this item from the front?
Considering the visible joins and seams, what is the state of the upholstery?
What is the most apparent design feature of the sofa legs, if any are visible?
Describe the overall visual impression concerning the sofa's apparent level of formality?
What is the most visually prominent textural characteristic of the sofa's upholstery?
